intro.heading: Hi! I'm Axel, a Software Developer
intro.subheading: Passionate about performance optimization in Java, working in R&D at ActiveViam in Paris. Building innovative solutions and exploring the intersection of technology and chess.

cta.heading: Let's Connect and Build Something Great
